name: Metaglaphite
author: CancerGuy
description:
A mod, that adds new substance - metaglaphite and it's variations.
                  List of features:
                  - new mining drones
                  - new factories
                  - 2 new liquids
                  - new material
                  - walls equal to thorium analoques
                   and much more is going to be added in further updates.
                   GitHub page - https://github.com/AzhurniyBaklan/Metaglaphite
                   Steam workshop page - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2204296309
                   Comissions are accepted in either github or steam.
